title: Can you please identify this san serif?

author: gabcc54

comments.content: No. You didn't post anything. When you do, please post it in the correct forum for type identification, here: ==\> [Type ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114624/http:/www.typophile.com/typeid)
